actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to open certain withdrawn land in Big Horn County Wyoming, to locatable mineral development for bentonite mining.

summary.text: Declares open to locatable mineral development for bentonite mining certain withdrawn lands in Big Horn County, Wyoming.Permits the Secretary of the Army to close such land upon determination that closure is required by reason of a national emergency, for purpose of national defense or security.

titles.title: A bill to open certain withdrawn land in Big Horn County Wyoming, to locatable mineral development for bentonite mining.
